short_summary: Supply and delivery of professional musical instruments
description: For the supply and delivery of professional musical instruments for the Department of National Defence 31 Canadian Brigade Group in South Western Ontario
full_summary:
# Musical Instruments for the Department of National Defence

## Tender Announcement
### Reference Information

| Information | Value |
|-------------|-------|
| Reference Number       | WS3714032156-Doc3765983609 |
| Amendment Number      | 0                 |
| Solicitation Number   | WS3714032156       |

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: 2022-11-25
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-15, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2022-12-21
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

### Scope of Work

The government is seeking the supply and delivery of professional musical instruments for the Department of National Defence, 31 Canadian Brigade Group, located in Southwestern Ontario.

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection will be based on the combined rating of technical merit and price, with the highest score being awarded to the most qualified bidder.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to bidders that comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Delivery Location

The instruments are to be delivered to London, the location of the Department of National Defence.

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services, PSPC. The contracting officer can be contacted at crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### End User Entity

The end-user for this tender is the Department of National Defence, DND.

### Region

This tender is limited to Southwestern Ontario.

| Information | Value |
|-------------|-------|
| Region       | Southwestern Ontario |
| Delivery Location | London      |
| Defense Entity | Department of National Defense(31 Canadian Brigade Group) |
